history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER I'm going to Hilton Garden Inn University Place.
TTS Did you say that you wanted to go to hilton garden inn pittsburgh university place?
USER Yes.
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER Airport
TTS Did you say that you were leaving from pittsburgh international airport?
USER Yes.
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 07:34 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 3 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue at McKee Place</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 8:10pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 1 min to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 3454 Forbes avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
